name: Viruses in War
description:
Create your own viruses out of genes like move, eat, clone etc. and fight others!

Start right away - yet almost infinitive gene combinations are possible in this mixture of puzzle and simulation!

• Add a new virus.
• Find a strong gene combination by using the preview function and training opponents.
• Fight against friends and other people all over the world and challenge their viruses.
• Take revenge if your virus was beaten. Improve your virus and fight back!
• Advanced genes unlock after you defeated 6 opponents!

We would be happy to receive your feedback via the 'feedback' button from the menu inside the app. If you enjoy using our application we would also appreciate your rating!
